talk.utter: This is NOT an easy build. I think Albert did an AMAZING job with the design AND the build guide. And this is the coolest design I‚Äôve seen by far, BUT BUT BUT it is still extremely non-trivial to build. It requires you to be pretty good at printing AND very handy with DIY electronics projects.

talk.utter:
This design is so complex that it is easy to get yourself frustrated and stuck with either the 3d printing or the electronics (probably both). I‚Äôm pretty ok at both these things and I found both parts pretty challenging.
